name: Cleanup Project
description:
All you wanted to do was go for a little jog, but look at this. Someone dumped a bunch of trash in front of your house. It'll be quite a project to clean this all up! Start with the trash on your street corner, upgrade your capacity, and start exploring your town for other effective ways to keep it a pleasant and safe place to live. And watch out for pollution from the factories!

Originally started as a submission at Eco Jam for Earth Day 2022, now expanded and improved with more gameplay.

Single player game for mouse and keyboard. Includes exploration of your town, several methods of cleaning it up based on real-world solutions, stats screen to show your progress, and multiple ways to win. DRM-free.
